name: Elemental Storm (Ommadawn)
description:
Keep balance between elements !

3 elements live in harmony... Kind of. This world is very *unstable* so you have to maintain each territory clean !

Each element beats another :


Software Used

The game was made with Unity 2020.3.16f1. For the assets :

- **UI**    : Paint.net

- **3D**    : Blender

- **Music** : Bitwig

- **Sounds**: Audacity

- **Code**  : Visual Studio 2019
